faqs.title: Domande Frequenti
faqs.subtitle: Tutto ciò che devi sapere sui nostri strumenti PDF

item-1.question: I miei file vengono caricati su un server?
item-1.answer: No. Tutta l'elaborazione avviene direttamente nel tuo browser utilizzando JavaScript. I tuoi file non lasciano mai il tuo dispositivo, garantendo privacy completa.

item-2.question: C'è un limite di dimensione file?
item-2.answer: Sono supportati file fino a 100MB. Il limite effettivo dipende dalla memoria disponibile del tuo browser e dalle capacità del dispositivo.

item-3.question: Gli strumenti sono davvero gratuiti?
item-3.answer: Sì, tutti gli strumenti PDF sono completamente gratuiti senza registrazione, senza watermark e senza limitazioni.

item-4.question: La qualità dei miei PDF sarà influenzata?
item-4.answer: No, i nostri strumenti preservano la qualità originale dei tuoi PDF. Operazioni come unire, dividere e ruotare sono senza perdita di qualità.

item-5.question: Quali browser sono supportati?
item-5.answer: I nostri strumenti funzionano in tutti i browser moderni inclusi Chrome, Firefox, Safari e Edge. Assicurati che il tuo browser sia aggiornato.

mergePdf.name: Unisci PDF
mergePdf.description: Combina più file PDF in un unico documento.
mergePdf.metaTitle: Merge PDF Files Online Free - PDF Combiner
mergePdf.metaDescription: Merge multiple PDF files into one document for free. Drag and drop to reorder. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
mergePdf.longDescription: Combine multiple PDF documents into a single file quickly and easily. Drag and drop your PDF files, arrange them in your preferred order, and merge. All processing happens locally in your browser.

item-1.question: How many PDF files can I merge at once?
item-1.answer: There is no hard limit on the number of files. However, very large files may take longer to process depending on your device's memory.

item-2.question: Will merging reduce the quality of my PDFs?
item-2.answer: No. The merge operation preserves the original quality of all pages. No recompression or quality loss occurs.

item-3.question: Are my files uploaded to a server?
item-3.answer: No. All processing happens directly in your browser. Your files never leave your device.

item-4.question: Can I reorder pages before merging?
item-4.answer: Yes. You can drag and drop files to change their order before merging them into a single PDF.

item-5.question: What is the maximum file size?
item-5.answer: Files up to 100MB each are supported. The actual limit depends on your browser's available memory.

splitPdf.longDescription: Split a PDF document into individual pages or extract specific page ranges. Select which pages you want to extract, and download them as separate PDF files.

item-1.question: Can I split a PDF into individual pages?
item-1.answer: Yes. You can split a PDF into individual single-page files or define custom page ranges.

item-2.question: Can I extract specific pages from a PDF?
item-2.answer: Yes. Select the exact pages or page ranges you want to extract from the original document.

item-3.question: Will splitting affect the page quality?
item-3.answer: No. Each extracted page maintains the original quality and formatting.

item-4.question: How do I define custom page ranges?
item-4.answer: Enter page ranges like '1-3, 5, 7-9' to extract those specific pages into separate files.

item-5.question: Is there a page limit?
item-5.answer: No fixed limit. The tool can handle large PDFs, limited only by your browser's memory.

compressPdf.name: Comprimi PDF
compressPdf.description: Riduci la dimensione del file PDF preservando la qualità.
compressPdf.metaTitle: Compress PDF Online Free - Reduce PDF File Size
compressPdf.metaDescription: Compress PDF files to reduce file size for free. Optimize PDFs for email and web. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
compressPdf.longDescription: Reduce the file size of your PDF documents by removing unused objects and optimizing the document structure. Perfect for making PDFs easier to share via email or upload to websites.

item-1.question: How much can my PDF be compressed?
item-1.answer: Compression results vary depending on the PDF content. Documents with large embedded images see the most reduction.

item-2.question: Will compression reduce the visual quality?
item-2.answer: The optimization focuses on removing unused objects and streamlining the file structure. Visual quality is preserved.

item-3.question: Can I compress multiple PDFs at once?
item-3.answer: Currently, you can compress one PDF at a time. Process each file individually for best results.

item-4.question: What if the compressed file is the same size?
item-4.answer: If the PDF is already optimized, compression may not reduce the size significantly. The tool will show you the before and after sizes.

item-5.question: Is the compression lossless?
item-5.answer: Yes. The compression removes redundant data without affecting the visible content of the document.

rotatePdf.name: Ruota PDF
rotatePdf.description: Ruota le pagine PDF nell'orientamento corretto.
rotatePdf.metaDescription: Rotate PDF pages by 90, 180, or 270 degrees for free. Fix page orientation easily. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
rotatePdf.longDescription: Rotate individual pages or all pages in your PDF document. Fix incorrectly oriented pages by rotating them 90, 180, or 270 degrees. Preview each page before applying changes.

item-1.question: Can I rotate individual pages?
item-1.answer: Yes. You can rotate each page independently or apply the same rotation to all pages at once.

item-2.question: What rotation angles are supported?
item-2.answer: You can rotate pages by 90° (clockwise), 180°, or 270° (counter-clockwise).

item-3.question: Will rotation affect the content quality?
item-3.answer: No. Rotation only changes the page orientation without any effect on content quality.

item-4.question: Can I preview pages before rotating?
item-4.answer: Yes. You can see thumbnails of all pages and preview the rotation before applying it.

item-5.question: Can I undo a rotation?
item-5.answer: Yes. Simply rotate the page again to return it to the original orientation, or start over.

pdfToPng.name: PDF in PNG + Long Image
pdfToPng.description: Converti pagine PDF in immagini PNG ad alta qualità con compressione senza perdita.
pdfToPng.metaTitle: Convert PDF to PNG Online Free - PDF to PNG Converter
pdfToPng.metaDescription: Convert PDF pages to PNG images for free. Merge multiple pages into one long image. High-quality lossless conversion with adjustable resolution. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
pdfToPng.longDescription: Convert each page of your PDF document into high-quality PNG images with lossless compression. PNG preserves sharp text and graphics perfectly, making it ideal for documents, screenshots, and images requiring transparency support. Option to merge all pages into a single long image for easy social media sharing.

item-1.question: Why choose PNG over other formats?
item-1.answer: PNG uses lossless compression, meaning no quality is lost during conversion. It preserves sharp text, clean lines, and supports transparency — ideal for documents and graphics.

item-2.question: Can I adjust the image resolution?
item-2.answer: Yes. Use the scale slider to set the output resolution from 1x to 4x. The default is 2x (144 DPI), suitable for most use cases.

item-3.question: Will PNG files be larger than JPG?
item-3.answer: Generally yes, because PNG uses lossless compression. However, for text-heavy documents, the difference is often minimal while the quality is noticeably better.

item-4.question: Does PNG support transparency?
item-4.answer: Yes. PNG supports alpha transparency, so any transparent areas in your PDF will be preserved in the output images.

item-5.question: Can I convert a multi-page PDF?
item-5.answer: Yes. Each page is converted to a separate PNG file that you can download individually.

pdfToJpg.description: Converti pagine PDF in immagini JPG con qualità regolabile.
pdfToJpg.metaTitle: Convert PDF to JPG Online Free - PDF to JPEG Converter
pdfToJpg.metaDescription: Convert PDF pages to JPG images for free. Merge multiple pages into one long image. Adjustable quality and resolution settings. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
pdfToJpg.longDescription: Convert each page of your PDF document into JPG images. Adjust the quality and resolution to balance file size and visual fidelity. JPG is the most widely supported image format, ideal for photos, web use, and sharing. Option to merge all pages into a single long image for easy social media sharing.

item-1.question: Can I adjust the JPG quality?
item-1.answer: Yes. Use the quality slider to set output quality from 10% to 100%. Higher quality means larger file sizes but better visual fidelity.

item-2.question: What resolution will the images be?
item-2.answer: The default is 2x scale (144 DPI). You can increase up to 4x for high-resolution output or decrease to 1x for smaller files.

item-3.question: What is the difference between JPG and PNG?
item-3.answer: JPG uses lossy compression for smaller files, best for photos. PNG uses lossless compression for perfect quality, best for text and graphics.

item-4.question: Can I convert a multi-page PDF?
item-4.answer: Yes. Each page is converted to a separate JPG file that you can download individually.

item-5.question: Will colors be preserved accurately?
item-5.answer: Yes. JPG supports millions of colors and handles photographs and gradient-rich documents very well.

pdfToWebp.metaTitle: Convert PDF to WebP Online Free - PDF to WebP Converter
pdfToWebp.metaDescription: Convert PDF pages to WebP images for free. Merge multiple pages into one long image. Modern format with superior compression and quality. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
pdfToWebp.longDescription: Convert each page of your PDF document into WebP images, the modern image format developed by Google. WebP offers superior compression with excellent visual quality, resulting in significantly smaller file sizes compared to JPG and PNG. Option to merge all pages into a single long image for easy social media sharing.

item-1.question: What is WebP format?
item-1.answer: WebP is a modern image format developed by Google that provides superior lossy and lossless compression. It produces smaller files than JPG and PNG while maintaining comparable quality.

item-2.question: Is WebP supported by all browsers?
item-2.answer: WebP is supported by all modern browsers including Chrome, Firefox, Edge, and Safari 16+. It has over 97% global browser support.

item-3.question: Can I adjust the WebP quality?
item-3.answer: Yes. Use the quality slider to balance file size and visual quality. Lower quality produces smaller files, while higher quality preserves more detail.

item-4.question: How does WebP compare to JPG?
item-4.answer: WebP typically produces files 25-35% smaller than JPG at equivalent visual quality, making it ideal for web use where bandwidth matters.

item-5.question: Can I convert a multi-page PDF?
item-5.answer: Yes. Each page is converted to a separate WebP file that you can download individually.

item-2.question: Can I reorder images before converting?

item-3.question: Is transparency preserved in the PDF?

item-4.question: How many PNG images can I combine?

item-5.question: What will the page size be?

item-1.question: Can I customize the watermark appearance?
item-1.answer: Yes. You can adjust the text, font size, color, opacity, rotation angle, and position.

item-2.question: Is the watermark applied to all pages?
item-2.answer: Yes. The watermark is applied uniformly to every page in the document.

item-3.question: Can I add image watermarks?
item-3.answer: Currently, only text watermarks are supported. Image watermark support may be added in the future.

item-4.question: Can I remove a watermark after adding it?
item-4.answer: The watermark is permanently embedded in the new PDF. Keep your original file if you may need the unwatermarked version.

item-5.question: Will the watermark cover the existing content?
item-5.answer: You can adjust the opacity to make the watermark semi-transparent so it doesn't obscure the underlying content.

pageNumbers.longDescription: Add page numbers to your PDF documents with full control over position, format, and styling. Choose from numeric, Roman numeral, or 'Page X of Y' formats. Place numbers at any corner or center position.

item-1.question: What number formats are available?
item-1.answer: You can choose from numeric (1, 2, 3), Roman numerals (I, II, III), or 'Page X of Y' format.

item-2.question: Can I choose where the numbers appear?
item-2.answer: Yes. You can place page numbers at the top or bottom of the page, aligned left, center, or right.

item-3.question: Can I start from a number other than 1?
item-3.answer: Yes. You can set any starting page number.

item-4.question: Will page numbers overlap existing content?
item-4.answer: Page numbers are placed in the margin area. For best results, ensure your document has sufficient margins.

item-5.question: Can I skip numbering on certain pages?
item-5.answer: Currently, page numbers are added to all pages. You can use the extract tool to separate pages if needed.

Suitable for processing documents that need to be made public but contain confidential information.

item-1.question: What is the difference between redaction and overlaying?
item-1.answer: Redaction permanently deletes content and cannot be recovered; overlaying only places a mask over the content, and the underlying data still exists. Redaction provides true secure deletion.

item-2.question: Can redaction be undone?
item-2.answer: No. Redaction is permanent. Please be sure to keep a backup of the original document in case you need the unredacted version.

item-3.question: What content can be redacted?
item-3.answer: Text, images, and page areas can be redacted. Select the content to redact, and the tool will permanently remove it from the document.

item-4.question: What is the quality of the redacted document?
item-4.answer: Redacted areas are replaced with black or white blocks, surrounding content remains unchanged, and the rest of the document quality is unaffected.

item-5.question: How to ensure thorough redaction?
item-5.answer: This tool uses the pdf-lib library to truly delete content, not just overlay it. Redacted content cannot be recovered by text extraction tools.

item-1.title: Information Disclosure
item-1.description: Redact personally identifiable information, account numbers, and other sensitive content before making documents public.

item-2.title: Legal Documents
item-2.description: Redact privileged information, confidential terms, and other sensitive content in legal documents.

item-3.title: Medical Records
item-3.description: Redact patient names, ID numbers, and other personal health information (PHI) to comply with privacy regulations.

item-4.title: Financial Reports
item-4.description: Redact account numbers, transaction details, and other sensitive financial information before sharing financial reports.

ocrPdf.name: OCR PDF
ocrPdf.description: Converti documenti scansionati in PDF con testo selezionabile.
ocrPdf.metaTitle: PDF OCR Online Free - Text Recognition
ocrPdf.metaDescription: Free recognize text in scanned PDFs and convert to searchable, copyable documents. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
ocrPdf.longDescription: Use OCR technology to recognize text in scanned PDFs or image-based PDFs. Convert non-searchable image text to searchable, selectable text layer while preserving the original image appearance.

item-1.question: What languages does OCR support?
item-1.answer: Supports multiple languages including Chinese and English. You can select the primary language in the document to improve recognition accuracy.

item-2.question: How accurate is the recognition?
item-2.answer: Accuracy depends on scan quality and text clarity. Clear printed documents typically achieve over 95% accuracy.

item-3.question: Will OCR change the document appearance?
item-3.answer: No. OCR adds a transparent text layer over the original image. The document appearance remains unchanged, but text becomes selectable and searchable.

item-4.question: Can it process multi-page documents?
item-4.answer: Yes. The tool processes multi-page PDFs page by page, performing OCR recognition on each page.

item-5.question: What is the processing speed?
item-5.answer: Depends on document page count and complexity. Typically takes a few seconds per page.

item-1.title: Archive Digitization
item-1.description: Convert scanned paper archives to searchable electronic documents.

item-2.title: Contract Processing
item-2.description: Make scanned contract documents searchable by keyword for easy clause lookup.

item-3.title: Academic Research
item-3.description: Convert scanned paper and book pages to copyable format for citations.

item-4.title: Form Data Extraction
item-4.description: Recognize text content in scanned forms for subsequent editing and analysis.

resizePdf.name: Ridimensiona PDF
resizePdf.description: Cambia la dimensione delle pagine PDF in una dimensione diversa.
resizePdf.metaDescription: Free change PDF page size. Supports A4, Letter, Legal, and other standard sizes. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
resizePdf.longDescription: Adjust the page size of PDF documents for different uses. Supports various standard paper sizes including A4, Letter, Legal, etc. Can scale content to fit new size or maintain original content size.

item-1.question: What page sizes are supported?
item-1.answer: Supports common standard sizes including A4, Letter, Legal, A3, A5, etc.

item-2.question: Will resizing affect content?
item-2.answer: You can choose to scale content to fit the new size or maintain original content size. Scaling may result in content being cropped or white space appearing.

item-3.question: Will all pages be resized uniformly?
item-3.answer: Yes. This tool adjusts all pages in the document to the same specified size.

item-4.question: Can I set custom sizes?
item-4.answer: Current version supports preset standard sizes. For special sizes, please use the print to PDF function.

item-5.question: Will quality change after resizing?
item-5.answer: Text and vector graphics remain clear. Image quality depends on original resolution and scaling ratio.

item-1.title: Print Adaptation
item-1.description: Adjust page size to match paper sizes supported by your printer.

item-2.title: Standard Archiving
item-2.description: Standardize documents to A4 size for consistent archiving.

item-3.title: Email Distribution
item-3.description: Adjust to larger sizes for screen reading, or smaller sizes to reduce file size for email.

item-4.title: Publishing
item-4.description: Adjust to standard sizes required for printing such as Letter or Legal.

sanitizePdf.name: Sanitizza PDF
sanitizePdf.description: Rimuovi metadati e informazioni nascoste dai documenti PDF.
sanitizePdf.metaTitle: Free PDF Sanitization Online - Remove Metadata
sanitizePdf.metaDescription: Free remove metadata, JavaScript, annotations from PDFs. Protect privacy and share documents securely. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
sanitizePdf.longDescription: Clean sensitive information and hidden content from PDF documents. Remove metadata (author, creator, timestamps), JavaScript code, hyperlinks, comments, embedded files, etc. Use before sharing documents to protect your privacy and sensitive information.

item-1.question: Will sanitizing PDF change the document content?
item-1.answer: No. Sanitization only removes metadata and hidden additional content. The visible page content of the document remains unchanged.

item-2.question: Can I sanitize only specific items?
item-2.answer: Yes. You can selectively clean metadata, JavaScript, embedded files, hyperlinks, or comments in any combination.

item-3.question: Can metadata be recovered after sanitization?
item-3.answer: No. Sanitization is permanent. Deleted metadata cannot be recovered. It's recommended to keep a backup of the original document.

item-4.question: Why should I sanitize PDFs?
item-4.answer: PDFs may contain creator information, edit history, hidden annotations and other sensitive data. Sanitization removes this information before sharing, protecting your privacy.

item-5.question: Will sanitization reduce file size?
item-5.answer: It may reduce slightly, especially when removing embedded files or large numbers of annotations. But the main purpose is security rather than compression.

item-1.title: Secure Sharing
item-1.description: Clean internal metadata and edit traces before sharing documents externally.

item-2.title: Privacy Protection
item-2.description: Remove author information, creation time and other metadata that could reveal identity.

item-3.title: Remove Malicious Code
item-3.description: Delete JavaScript code from PDFs to prevent potential security risks.

item-4.title: Document Archiving
item-4.description: Create clean professional document versions for long-term archiving.

headerFooter.name: Intestazione/Piè di Pagina
headerFooter.description: Aggiungi o modifica intestazioni e piè di pagina nei documenti PDF.

headerFooter.metaDescription: Free add headers and footers to PDF documents. Customize text, position, and font styles. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
headerFooter.longDescription: Add professional headers and footers to PDF documents. Support for custom text content, font size, color, and position on the page. Can be displayed on odd pages only, even pages only, or applied to all pages.

item-1.question: What content can be added to headers and footers?
item-1.answer: You can add any text content such as document titles, chapter names, company names, dates, etc.

item-2.question: Can I customize the style?
item-2.answer: Yes. You can set font size, color, and choose left alignment, center alignment, or right alignment.

item-3.question: Can I apply to specific pages only?
item-3.answer: Yes. You can choose to apply headers and footers to all pages, odd pages only, or even pages only.

item-4.question: Will headers and footers overlap existing content?
item-4.answer: Headers and footers are added in the margin area. It is recommended to ensure the document has sufficient margin space.

item-5.question: Can I add images to headers and footers?
item-5.answer: Current version only supports text. For images, please use the watermark tool.

item-2.title: Document Identification

duplicatePages.name: Duplica Pagine
duplicatePages.description: Duplica pagine specifiche in un documento PDF.
duplicatePages.metaDescription: Free duplicate specific pages in PDF. Select pages to copy, specify insertion position and number of copies. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
duplicatePages.longDescription: Quickly copy pages from PDF documents. Select the pages to copy, set the number of copies, and choose to insert copies at the beginning or end of the document. Ideal for creating documents with repeated content or backing up important pages.

item-1.question: Which pages can be copied?
item-1.answer: You can select and copy any one or more pages. Supports selecting non-consecutive pages for simultaneous copying.

item-2.question: Can I create multiple copies?
item-2.answer: Yes. You can set 1-10 copies, and the selected pages will be duplicated according to the specified number.

item-3.question: Where will the copies be inserted?
item-3.answer: You can choose to insert copies at the beginning or end of the document. By default, copies are added at the end.

item-4.question: Will the original pages be preserved?
item-4.answer: Yes. The duplicate operation preserves all original pages and simply adds additional copies.

item-5.question: What is the quality of duplicated pages?
item-5.answer: The copies are identical to the original pages, maintaining the original formatting, images, and text quality.

item-1.title: Repeated Content Templates
item-1.description: Duplicate pages containing standard formats or templates for multi-page forms or contracts.

item-2.title: Backup Important Pages
item-2.description: Create backup copies of important information pages within the document.

item-3.description: Duplicate certificate or award pages to generate multiple documents with the same content.

item-4.title: Expand Forms

verifyPdf.name: Verifica PDF
verifyPdf.description: Verifica l'integrità e la validità dei documenti PDF.
verifyPdf.metaTitle: Free PDF Verification Online - Digital Signature Checker
verifyPdf.metaDescription: Free verify PDF digital signature validity and document integrity. Check encryption status, JavaScript and embedded files. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
verifyPdf.longDescription: Comprehensively verify the security and integrity of PDF documents. Detect digital signature information (signer, time, location), verify document structure integrity, check encryption status, identify JavaScript code and embedded files. Help you confirm the authenticity and security of documents.

item-1.question: Can the verification tool confirm if a signature is legally valid?
item-1.answer: It can detect the presence and basic information of signatures, but complete cryptographic verification requires certificate chain validation. The tool displays signature structure and integrity information.

item-2.question: Can it detect if a document has been tampered with?
item-2.answer: It can detect whether the document structure is complete and whether the digital signature is intact. If signature verification fails, it may indicate the document has been modified.

item-3.question: What is the JavaScript risk in PDFs?
item-3.answer: JavaScript in PDFs can execute automatic actions, which while useful can also be misused. The verification tool identifies documents containing JavaScript.

item-4.question: Can encrypted PDFs be verified?
item-4.answer: Yes. The tool detects encryption status and displays relevant information, but full content analysis requires decryption.

item-5.question: What are embedded files in the verification results?
item-5.answer: PDFs can embed other files (like attachments). The verification tool identifies these embedded contents to help you understand all data contained in the document.

item-1.title: Contract Verification
item-1.description: Verify the validity of digital signatures and signer identity for signed contracts.

item-2.title: Security Check
item-2.description: Check if received PDFs contain suspicious JavaScript or embedded files.

item-3.title: Document Audit
item-3.description: Audit document integrity and modification history to ensure documents haven't been tampered with.

item-4.title: Compliance Verification
item-4.description: Verify if documents meet security compliance requirements, such as encryption or signatures.

item-1.answer: The conversion attempts to preserve text structure and paragraph formatting, but complex layouts, tables, and images may require manual adjustment.

item-2.question: What types of PDFs are supported?
item-2.answer: Text-based PDF documents are supported. Scanned PDFs or image-only PDFs require OCR processing first before they can be converted to editable Word documents.

item-3.question: Can the converted document be opened in Microsoft Word?
item-3.answer: Yes. The converted DOCX files are fully compatible with Microsoft Word, Google Docs, WPS Office, and other popular word processing software.

item-4.question: Is there a file size limit?
item-4.answer: PDF files up to 100MB are supported. The actual limit depends on your browser's available memory.

item-5.question: Can the converted Word document be edited?
item-5.answer: Yes. The converted DOCX file is a fully editable Word document. You can modify text and add content just like any regular Word document.

item-3.question: Can the converted Excel file be edited?
item-3.answer: Yes. The converted XLSX file is a fully editable Excel spreadsheet. You can modify data, add formulas, create charts, and more.

item-4.question: Can tables in scanned PDFs be converted?
item-4.answer: Scanned PDFs contain images rather than extractable text data, so they cannot be directly converted to Excel. OCR processing is required first.

item-5.question: Will number formatting be preserved?
item-5.answer: Numbers are extracted as text. You can use Excel's 'Convert to Number' feature to convert text numbers to numeric format.
